HEADING: Questions
MESSAGE_NO_QUESTIONS: You don't have any questions! Start collecting feedback today and add some questions.
MESSAGE_QUESTION_USES: Questions can be shown above the comment widget or sent as surveys to your customers. Questions can be tied to pages or products and reported and alerted on over time.
MESSAGE_FEEDBACK_TAB: Adding a question will cause a new Feedback tab to appear in the product where you can analyze question results.
MESSAGE_WITH_QUESTIONS: Here are your questions. You can report on them in the Feedback tab. Show a question above the comment widget by adding a customization rule.
